apps.name: RXTikTok
apps.subtitle: An awesome TikTok Tweak.
apps.localizedDescription:
*CHANGELOG* **â†“**
*ADDED:*
- HD Private Video Downloading (must be following user, obviously)
- Anonymous Profile Viewing
- Save Your RX Config to the Keychain
- Disable Story Photo Auto-Advance
- Story Video Looping
- Remove TikTok Referral ADs
- Mark As Read Upon Reply
- Disable Screenshot & Screen Recording Detection in DMs
- Instant RX Language Change (full restart still required for complete translation)
- Code Optimization

*FIXED:*
- Liking Posts, DM Requests, Reposting
- Photo Downloading
- "Saved" Banner Dismissing
- Offline Video Downloading
- Profile Picture Downloading
- USA Region (just added back to selection list, unsure if it works)
- Offline Videos Slider (now counts properly)

*CHANGED:*
- Settings Style Re-Format

*REMOVED:*
- Creator Profile Pull (broken)
- Extended Bio Character Limit (now server-sided)

Changelog 1.4.5: https://t.me/BHTikTokPlusPlus/194
